subject: INDEV
title: Global Health
description: This course explores aspects of the distribution, diffusion, determinants and delivery of health and health care in a global context.  Building on foundational skills (i.e. basic understandings of epidemiology; the social determinants of health) the course will review a range of case studies (e.g. infectious disease; water; access to care; global environmental change) from a variety of regions around the world.  Students will gain an appreciation for the complexity of the issues, as well as science-policy bridging.
